title: Textile, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 7/1 satin weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: White satin ground, with hunters, dogs, lions, peacocks and trees brocaded in brillian polychrome silks and blue, red and tan chenille.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk
Technique: 7/1 satin weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. Montgomery Hare. 1932-11-12-a/d.
